plants.name: Disparavilha
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Como é que uma única planta consegue crescer e disparar tantas ervilhas tão rápido? A Disparavilha diz: "Trabalho duro, compromisso, saúde e um almoço saudável e bem equilibrado de luz solar com dióxido de carbono rico em fibras tornam isso tudo possível."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Disparavilhas são as tuas primeiras linhas de defesa. Elas disparam ervilhas aos zombies atacantes.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Uma faixa</color></size>

plants.name: Girassol
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Girassol não resite abanar o capacete ao ritmo da batida. Que batida é essa? Ora, o revigorante ritmo de jazz da própria Terra, vibrando numa frequência que só o Girassol pode ouvir.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Girassóis são essenciais para produzires um solzinho extra. Tenta plantar o máximo que puderes!

<color=black>Produção Solar: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25s</color></size>

plants.name: Bomba-Cerejas
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Eu quero explodir", diz a Cereja Um."Não, vamos é detonar!" diz a Cereja Dois. Depois de uma intensa reunião, eles concordaram em "explodonar".</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Bombas-Cerejas conseguem rebentar todos os zombies numa área. Elas têm o pavio curto, então planta-as perto de zombies.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremação)</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>3×3 (Uma circulo com um raio de 1,375 azulejos)</color></size>

plants.name: Noz
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"As pessoas perguntam-se como é que é estar sempre a ser mastigado por zombies", diz a Noz."O que elas não sabem é que, com os meus sentidos limitados, tudo o que eu sinto é uma espécie de formigueiro, tipo um relaxante coçar de costas".</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Nozes têm casca rija que protegem as tuas outras plantas.

<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>A Noz e as suas fusões subsequentes previnem o dano de área de cerejas explosivas a dificulades 4 ou menos. </color></size>

plants.name: Batata-Mina
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Alguns dizem que o Batata-Mina é preguiçoso, que deixa tudo para a última hora. O Batata-Mina não diz nada. Ele está demasiado ocupado a pensar na sua estratégia de investimento.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Batata-Mina trazem tudo consigo, só precisam é de um tempo para se armarem. Deves plantá-los à frente dos zombies. Eles explodem se lhes tocarem.

<color=black>Armação: </color><color=#8B0000>15~17s</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Um azulejo (Um círculo com um raio de 0,68 azulejos)</color>
<color=#780072>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos). </color></size>

plants.name: Trincador
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Trincador quase que conseguiu um trabalho na "Pequena Loja dos Horrores", mas foi por água abaixo quando o seu agente exigiu demasiado no adiantamento. O Trincador não guarda ressentimentos. Que diz que faz parte de negócios.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Trincadores conseguem devorar um zombie inteiro, mas ficam vulneráveis enquanto mastigarem.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>Morte instantânea (Devoração)
<color=black>Tempo de Consumo: </color><color=#8B0000>36s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Causa 40 de dano por dentada a zombies imunes a serem devorados.</color></size>

plants.name: Puff-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Só recentemente é que tomei consciência da existência dos zomvies", diz o Puff-gumelo."Tal como muitos fungos, pensava que eles eram apenas contos de fadas ou monstros de filmes. Esta experiência tem sido bastante reveladora para mim."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Puff-gumelos são baratos, mas têm curto alcance.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>2,5 azulejos à frente</color>
<color=#780072>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000
<color=black>•</color> Consegue empilhar até três vezes num único azulejo.
<color=black>•</color> Planta curta (evade projéteis diretos).</color>
<color=black>Disseminação: </color><color=#8B0000>Planta Fumo-gumelos ou Medo-gumelos em 1/2/3 Puff-gumelos para disseminá-lo em frente ou em forma de ventoinha, brotanto 1/2/3 Puff-gumelos.</color></size>

plants.name: Fumo-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Eu estava num emprego sem futuro a produzir esporos de levedura para uma padaria", diz Fumo-gumelo."Até que o Puff-gumelo, abençoado seja, falou-me desta ótima oportunidade em disparar contra zombies. Agora sim, sinto mesmo que estou a fazer a diferença."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Fumo-gumelos disparam fumos que conseguem atravessar portas.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5s (Perfuração)</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>4 azulejos à frente</color>
<color=#780072>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Tem perfuração ilimitada, ignora armadura de mão (Tipo 2).
<color=black>•</color> Disseminador de Puff-gumelos.</color></size>

plants.name: Hipno-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Os zombies são nossos amigos", confirma Hipno-gumelo."Infelizmente, não são criaturas compreendidas mesmo tendo um papel fulcral na nossa ecologia. Nós podemos e devemos fazer mais para trazê-los para esta nossa perspetiva."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Quando comido, o Hipno-gumelo fará um zombie voltar para trás e lutar por ti.

<color=#780072>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Faz um único zombie lutar por ti.</color></size>

plants.name: Medo-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Quem vem lá?" sussurra o Medo-gumelo, com uma voz quase inaudível."Vai-te embora. Não quero ver ninguém. A não ser que seja o homem do circo."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Medo-gumelos são atiradores de longa-distância que se escondem quando inimigos se aproximmam.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5s>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Faixa única</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Assusta-se e pára de atacar quando zombies entram na área 3x3 circundante.
<color=black>•</color> Disseminador de Puff-gumelos.</color></size>

plants.name: Gelo-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Gelo-gumelo franzia o sombrolho. Não porque estava triste ou porque não concordava com algo, mas sim devido a uma lesão de infância que deixou os seus nervos faciais paralizados.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Gelo-gumelos imbolizam temporariamente todos os zombies à mostra.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Congela todos os zombies no lugar por 4 segundos, inflige Frio por 10 segundos e dá 20 de dano a todos os zombies não-voadores.</color></size>

plants.name: Doom-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Tens sorte que eu estou do teu lado", diz Doom-gumelo. "Eu poderia destruir tudo o que amas. Não seria difícil."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Doom-gumelos destroem tudo numa grande área e deixam uma cratera onde não se consegue plantar.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremação)</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>5×5 (Um círculo com um raio de 3,75 azulejos)</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Após a explosão, deixa uma cratera que dura por 180 segundos. A cratera não se forma quando em água.</color></size>

plants.name: Nenúfar
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Nenúfar nunca se queixa. Nenúfar nunca quer saber o que é que se está a passar. Põe uma planta sobre Nenúfar, ele não dirá nenhum. Será que ele tem opiniões sensacionais ou segredos chocantes? Ninguém sabe. Nenúfar guarda tudo para si.</color></size>
plants.info: Os Nenúfares deixam-te plantar plantas não-aquáticas em cima deles. Especial: Plantas não-aquáticas conseguem ser plantadas em cima deles. Quando plantas específicas são colocadas, o Nenúfar transforma-se numa variante dessa planta e consegue automaticamente plantar a planta que o transformou a cada 90 segundos. Variantes: Girassól, Trêsvilha, Esmaga, Lareiras, Jalapeño.

plants.name: Esmaga
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Estou pronto!", grita Esmaga. "Bora lá! Mete-me em campo! Não há ninguém melhor! Sou o teu gajo! 'Nda lá! 'Tás à espera de quê? Eu preciso disto"!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Esmagas esmagam o primeiro zombie que se aproxima deles

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Zombies esmagdos não ativam os seus efeitos de morte.</color></size>

plants.name: Trêsvilha
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Trêsvilha gosta de ler, gamão e de longos períodos de imobilidade no parque. O Trêsvilha também gosta de ir a concertos, especialmente de jazz moderno. "Só estou à espera da tal", diz ele. O seu número favorito é o 5.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Trêsvilhas disparam ervilhas em três faixas.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×3/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>O Trêsvilha e as suas fusões subsequentes redirecionam quaisquer projéteis que saiam do mapa, quando nas faixas mais acime/abaixo, para as suas próprias.</color></size>

plants.name: Emaranhalga
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Sou completamente invisível",  pensa Emaranhalga para si. "Esconder-me-ei aqui mesmo debaixo da superfície e ninguém me verá". Os seus amigos dizem-lhe que a consegume ver perfeitamente, mas ela nunca mudará.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Emaranhalgas são plantas aquáticas que puxam o primeiro zombie que se aproxima paa debaixo de água.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>Morta instantânea (Agofamento)</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos). </color></size>

plants.name: Jalapeño
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"NNNNNGGGGG....", diz Jalapeño. Ele não vai explodir, não desta vez. Mas em breve, muito em breve. Está próximo. Ele sabe; ele sente; a sua vida inteira tem sido para este momento.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Jalapeños destorem uma faixa inteira de zombies.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremação)</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000> Faixa única</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Elimina instantaneamente Zombonies e os seus rastos de gelo .</color></size>

plants.name: Erva-espinho
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Erva-espinho é obcecado por hóquei. Tem bilhetes VIP para a temporada. Ele presta muita atenção aos seus jogadores favoritos e limpa consistentemente o bolão de hóquei do escritório. Só há um problema: ele tem um enorme pavor aos discos. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>O Erva-espinhos fura pneus e magoa quaisquer zombies que lhes pisem.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1 Second</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).
<color=black>•</color> Não bloqueia zombies normais.
<color=black>•</color> Mata instantaneamente veículos e desaparece.</color></size>

plants.name: Tocha Sueca
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Toda a gente gosta e respeita a Tocha Sueca. Gostam dela pela sua integridade, pela sua estável amizade, pela sua habilidade de maximizar enormemente o dano de ervilhas. Mas ela tem um segredo: ela não sabe ler.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Tochas Suecas transformam ervilhas em bolas de fogo que dão o dobro do dano.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Inflama ervilhas que passam por ela, dano +20. 
<color=black>•</color> Transforma ervilhas de neve em ervilhas normais. 
<color=black>•</color> Dispersa nevoeiro num X.</color></size>

plants.name: Mar-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Mar-gumelo nuna viu o mar. Está no seu nome, sim, já ouviu falar montes de vezes sobre isso, só que nunca conseguiu um tempo. Mas um dia ele há de se aperceber.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mar-gumelos são plantas aquáticas que disparam esporos de curto alcance.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000> 2.5 azulejos à frente</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).
<color=black>•</color> Devolve 50 sóis após fusões.</color></size>

plants.name: Planterna
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A Planterna desafia a ciência. É a cena dela. As outras plantas comem luz e excreta oxigénio; A Planterna come escuridão e excreta luz. Ela não nos diz como é que ela faz isso. "Não vou dizer que é 'magia', e não usaria bem o termo 'forças obscuras'. Eu só... Acho que já disse o suficiente".</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Planternas iluminam uma área que te permite ver no nevoeiro e dão níveis Lumos às plantas.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Dispera nevoeiro (5×7 exceto cantos). As fusões da Planterna dispersam nevoeiro num X mais pequeno.</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistema Lumos: </color><color=#8B0000>Provê 1 Nível Lumos numa grelha 3x3 que pode ser acumulada para provêr força a outras plantas Lumos. Consulta as suas fusões para a lista de plantas afetadas. .</color></size>

plants.name: Cato
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Ele pica, claro, mas os seu espinhos escondem um coração esponjoso cheio de amor e boas intenções. Ele só quer abraçar e ser abraçado. A maioria das pessoas não consegue lidar com isso, ms o Cato não se importa. Ele tem andado a sair com um armadilho durante um tempo e parece mesmo que vá resultar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Catos disparam espinhos que acertam alvos tanto terrestres como aéreos.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Prioriza zombies voadores.</color></size>

plants.name: Trêventoinha
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Quando o Trêventoinha fez 5 anos ele recebeu um bolo de aniversário novinho em folha. Ele lá fez o seu desejo, soprou e bufou mas só conseguiu extinguir cerca de 60% das velas. Mas em vez de desistir, ele usou essa tenra derrota como um catalisador para se puxar cada vez mais longe. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Trêventoinhas sopram para longe todos os zombies de balão e nevoeiro, excepto os Zombies Baldocóptero e Zompelins.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Sopra nevoeiro por 30s e Zombies Balão. Afasta levemente Zompelins.</color></size>

plants.name: Carambola
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Ó, meu", diz Carambola. "Fui ao dentista no outro dia e ele dise-me que tenha quatro cavidades. Eu tenho — e tu sabes contar — UM dente! Quatro cavidades num dente? Como é que isto acontece?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Carambolas disparam em 5 direções.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×5/1.5s</color></size>

plants.name: Abóbora
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A Abóbora acabou de chegar do seu part-time. "Para ser sincero, foi uma experiência bem divertida", rio. "Mas alguém pode-me explicar porque é que eles só me enchiam de doces e velas?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>As Abóboras protegem as plantas que estão dentro das suas cascas.

<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>A Abóbora e as suas fusões subsequentes previnem dano de área de cerejas explosivas até à dificuldade 4. </color>
<color=black>Prioridade de fusão: </color><color=#8B0000>Menor, mantém premido a tecla Left Shift enquanto fundes para fundir forçosamente com a Abóbora (com o mod 'Better Pumpkin Fusions', incluido por padrão).</color></size>

plants.name: Magneto-gumelo
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Toda a gente perguntava-se porque é que o Magento-gumelo tomava sempre tanto tempo para "digeri" o ferro que absorbia, mesmo que já tenha sido levado para fusões. Frustrado, estalou, "Eu não sou preguiçoso! Eu só desmaiei por causa de ferro voador!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Os Magneto-gumelos conseguem absorver objetos metálicos.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Atrai objetos de metal dentro de um raio de 3 azulejos. Demora 15 segundos para processar. Larga objetos não processados ao morrer ou fundir.</color>
<color=black>Se houver uma planta metálica nas 8 direções da proximidade de outra planta magnética, estas serão ligadas por um <color=#666699>Sistema Magnético</color>. O <color=#666699>Sistema Magnético</color> não tem limite nas conexões e aumentará a força de algumas plantas magnéticas baseado na sua quantidade. Consulta as suas fusões para a lista de plantas afetadas.</color></size>

plants.name: Couve-pulta
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Alguns dizem que o amor é como uma couve: tens de descascar camada por camada para ver o coração da outra pessoa. Mas a Couve-pulta tem alguns receios sobre isto, visto ainda estar solteira.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Lança couves para atacar zombies.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>40/3s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Faixa única</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Projéteis lançados em arco ignoram armadura portátil (Tipo 2).</color></size>

plants.name: Vaso
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>As plantas pensam sempre que  o Vaso é só mais um "vaso" mas, na verdade, o Vaso é uma "flor" que só se parece com um "vaso". Olha, aquele pequeno broto ali é o botão de uma flor.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Deixa que plantas sejam plantadas em cima dele.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Faz com que plantas possam ser plantadas no chão/telhad.
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).
<color=black>Prioridade de fusão: </color><color=#8B0000>Mais baixa, mantém premida a tecla Left Alt durante a fusão(com o mod 'Better Pot Fusions', incluído por padrão)</color>

plants.name: Milho-pulta
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>As plantas estão curiosas parasaber de onde vem a manteiga do Milho-pulta. Ele também não sabe, mas isso não o para de fzer pipocas com ela nos tempos livres para ganhar um bocadinho a mais.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Atira grãos de milho para atacar zombies, tal como manteiga para os imobilizar.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/3s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Faixa única</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Tem 1 em 4 chances de atirar manteiga, dando 40 de dano e imobilizando os zombies por 4 segundos<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Alho
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>O Alho gaba-se da sua alta concentração de alicina, que o seu consumo é bom para a saúde. Se é verdade ou não, é só ver os zombies a engasgarem-se ao mastigarem-no para saber que é bastante eficiente. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Qualquer zombie que tente comê-lo mudará de faixa.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Os zombies que o modram mudarão de faixa. Recebe nada mais do que 15 de dano por mordida
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).</color>

plants.name: Guarda-folhas
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Considerado um notório passador, o Guarda-folhas fou uma superstrela no 114.º NBA Planta-Zombie. Mas à medida que envelhecia, descobriu que estava a ficar careca.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Desvia bolas de basquetbol que se aproximem.

<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Protege plantas de projéteis de catapultas e Bungee-zombies numa áre 3x3.
<color=black>•</color> Protege plantas de bolas de basquetebol explosivas mas cada proteção custa 100 de Resistência
<color=black>•</color> Pára Zombies Meca-noz nos seus caminhos.</color>

plants.name: Margarida
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A Margarida é absurdamente rica, logo ela gasta livremente — memso que, tecnicamente, ela não tenha nem mãos nem pés.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Produz Moedas de Prata, Moedas de Ouro e Diamantes.

<color=black>Intervalo de produção: </color><color=#8B0000>25s</color>
<color=black>Quantidade de moedas:
</color><color=#8B0000><color=black>•</color> 75% de chance = 100 Moedas
<color=black>•</color> 20% de chance = 300 Moedas
<color=black>•</color> 5% de chance = 1000 Moedas</color>

plants.name: Melão-pulta
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Nos intervalos, o Melão-pulta adora dividir o seu braço de melão em dois, mordiscando-se para se refrescar. " Queres um pedaço?", pergunta sorridente aos zombies, enquanto que as plantas em volta, suando do calor, podem só salivar invejosamente.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Lança melões aos zombies para dar dano.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>80/3s</color>
<color=black>Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>Faixa única</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Os melões dão dano de área num raio de 1 azulejo com queda, calculado como dano de bala x8 /(número de zombies atingidos), limitado a 1/3 do dano de base dos projéteis.</color>

plants.name: Não-me-cortes
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Para as plantas, girar as pétalas sem estragar o caule é uma arte que requer anos. Alguns botânicos especulam que o Não-me-cortes possa ser um primo distante do Trêvenoinha por causa desta sua habilidade."É realmente algo dificil de dominar", diz Não-me-cortes com um ar pretensioso, "O verdadeiro desafio é obter lâminas leves e circulares e pintá-las como pétalas."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Magoa zombies próximos com as suas lâminas giratórias!!

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>8/0.02s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Ganha 5 pontos de Escudo por cada 0.5s, até um máximo de 300.
<color=black>•</color> Gira as lâminas quando zombies chegam perto, dando dano de perfuração que diminui com mas alvos, para um mínimo de 1.</color>
<color=black>Mecânica do Escudo: </color><color=#8B0000>Os escudos providam uma redução de dano de 20% a plantas protegidas.</color>

plants.name: Eletrôbola
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Eletrôbola thought his moment had come — after all, who else had eaten lightning over a hundred times? Surely, he was destined to play the Frankenstein monster! But when he received the script, his dreams short-circuited. He wasn't a star. He wasn't even a sidekick. He was just Dr. Stanley's lightning rod...</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Attack approaching zombies with lightning rays!

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>100/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Attack Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>5×5</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Idle Eletrôbolas in Alcance will channel power to the attacking one, each boosting the Dano by 150.
<color=black>•</color> Each shot can connect to other zombies to deal half the Dano, up to a maximum of 3 zombies.</color>

plants.name: Firnalha
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Firnalha won the sixth annual “Plant Helper” award of the Snowy Plains. Fellow plants agreed the honor was well deserved—after all, he’s so busy keeping others warm, he hasn’t even had time to clear the snow off his own head.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A floating firwood heater that helps nearby plants resist the cold.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Hovering plant. Protects plants in its own tile from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Deals 200 Dano every 3s to ice blocks within its protection Alcance.
<color=black>•</color> Absorbs the base Snow plant below it to temporarily evolve into Hi-temp Firnalha, expanding its protection Alcance to 3×3 for (1.2 × Plant Custo) seconds before reverting. Otherwise lasts 180s by default.
<color=#cceaed>Snow Map Gimmick</color>:
<color=black>•</color> Ice blocks have 2000 HP and block straight-firing projectiles and zombies.
<color=black>•</color> If destroyed by plants, spawns the corresponding plants.
<color=black>•</color> If spawns the corresponding zombotany instead; if none exists, spawns an Snowmaw.
<color=black>•</color> A blizzard starts at the beginning of every wave, freezing all unprotected plants into ice blocks.</color>

plants.name: Atirador Espruço
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Atirador Espruço just moved to the snowy plains. His pursed lips make him look fierce and hard to approach. But Firnalha isn't scared—he knows that expression is just from his new friend pulling up his collar because the snowfield is just that cold.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cold-resistant archer that fires piercing spruce needles.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Projectiles pierce once (including ice blocks) and ignore handheld armor (Type 2).</color>

plants.name: Lótus de Inverno
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Lótus de Neve never planned to become a healer—but when your mere presence makes nearby plants feel better, word spreads fast. Now she spends her days reluctantly running a clinic, insisting, “I’m just cold, not qualified.” Patients don’t seem to care.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cold-loving healer that gains energy in the cold to heal nearby plants.

<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1 ice charge every 10s or when hit by a snowball or snow trident.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes 5 charges to awaken and heal all plants in a 3×3 area for 50 HP every 3s.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.</color>

plants.name: Aloe Aqua
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Aloe Aqua thought opening a spa in the snowy plains would be relaxing—until she realized no one wants a cold soak in subzero weather. At least the snow keeps the towels crisp.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cold-loving lobber that throws dew drops, or ice chunks when it's sufficiently Frio.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20/3s</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/15 ice charges when affected by snowball/snow trident/Ice-shroom respectively.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes 1 charge to throw an ice chunk (×2 Dano, applies Deep Frio, 40 Cryo points).
<color=black>•</color> Deep Frio: same as regular Frio but affects Frost Legionnaires too. Zombonis are still immune.
<color=black>•</color> Deals ×4 Dano to frozen zombies.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs.</color>

plants.name: Mina-diamante
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I was always a weakling growing up, no match for zombies, and nobody wanted to play with me," said Mina-diamante. "But now, wrapped in diamond, I'm strong—and ready to fight back." He really needs to, though—he's already racked up quite the tab with Margarida.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mine-nut that's as hard and as rare as diamonds.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey: Randomized | Easter Egg plant with very rare chance of appearing</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>36000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).
<color=black>•</color> Anti-crush, takes no more than 200 Dano per hit.
<color=black>•</color> Produces 500 points on Dano phase transitions and on death.</color>

plants.name: Doubleblast Passionfruit
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Doubleblast Passionfruit only fires one shot at a time, so what’s the "double blast"? Ah, it’s the sound of zombie bones cracking.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Floating passionfruit that fires seeds at enemies.

<color=blue>SHUTTLE Collab Plant</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Hovering plant.
<color=black>•</color> Each hit deals an extra Dano equal to 10% of the zombie's max Resistência to the zombie's headgear armor (Type 1).
<color=black><color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Custos 3600 Coins. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Launches a giant passionfruit seed that deals Dano to armor equivalent to 20% of current HP.</color>

plants.name: Pearmafrost
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I fell from a pear tree, and I've been here a long time," says Pearmafrost. "Too bad there were no genius brains under the tree. But at least I can ponder physics myself." When will he take a break? That depends on when brainless zombies interrupt him.
plants.info:
<size=36>Releases shockwaves when bitten, dealing Dano and applying Frio.

<color=blue>SHUTTLE Collab Plant</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000> 4000</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>When bitten, releases a small shockwave every 3s, dealing 20 Dano and applying Frio, adding 35 Cryo points.</color>

plants.name: Icetip Lily
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Though he often shouts "Off with their heads!", Icetip Lily isn't a warmonger. As the master of Snowy Mountain martial arts, his ice-morphs-to-blade technique can deter any impure intruder.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Each attack releases 5 ice blades in a fan shape.

<color=blue>SHUTTLE Collab Plant</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×5/1.5s</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color>Blades pierce twice, apply Frio, add 5 Cryo points, and deal ×4 Dano to frozen zombies.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Attacks only when there are zombies in its own row.

plants.name: Chrysanctum
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Chrysanctum loves the snowy plains—every second here is rewarding and joyful. After all, he'd never seen snow before.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Grants nearby plants temporary invincibility.

<color=blue>PvZ: Ultimate Collab Plant</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
Disappears 2 seconds after planting. Grants all plants in a 3×3 area 6 seconds of immunity to all Dano and crushing.</color>

plants.name: Grave Buster
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Despite Grave Buster's fearsome appearance, he wants everyone to know that he loves kittens and spends his off hours volunteering at a local zombie rehabilitation center. "It's just the right thing to do," he says.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Plant Grave Busters on graves to remove the graves.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Plant Grave Buster on a gravestone to remove it, taking 5s. Drops itself as a seedpacket if not planted on a grave.</color>

plants.name: Obsidian Barley
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Obsidian Barley statue in the garden is rumored to be the result of a plants' building game gone rogue. "Who knows," says Obsidian Barley with a chuckle. "I think they saw me as the ultimate 'Build & Guess' challenge long before I arrived. But hey, I don't mind — who wouldn't want more chances to show off their looks?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A sleek, obsidian-like version of Barley that periodically transforms into a random Ultimate plant.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Conditions: Replaces Barley in Odyssey: Adventure</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Transforms into a random Ultimate plant every 36s (excluding Avarice-shroom)</color>

plants.name: Coldsnap Bean
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The plants couldn't figure out how such a tiny bean could Frio the air so effectively. But Coldsnap Bean just grinned mischievously. "You know why Cattail sneezes when she washes clothes? Because she washes 'cat' clothes." Maybe the real magic was in its sense of humor.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Hey↑ Yeh↓！

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Complete Wall-nut Billards 1</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Hovering plant.
<color=black>•</color> Strengthens the snow pea shooters below to launch polar ice peas, increasing the Dano and Cryo points inflicted on the zombie by 2 times.</color>

plants.name: Queen Endoflame
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The once-fiery little flower has grown into a master of sunlight production after enduring hardships. Queen Endoflame no longer needs to get hurt to shine. The torch on her head has become her power, blazing like the sun. The shining flames keep passing on, creating one Endoflame after another.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blasts zombies to dusts with solar flares.

<color=blue>PvZ: Cricket Fight S6 Collab Plant</color>
<color=#4A2900>Usage Conditions: Odyssey Mode</color>
<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Clear Odyssey Classic</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>50×8/3s</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Increases Dano by 25 for each unique type of Odyssey Plant on the field.
<color=black>•</color> Targets zombies across the screen (prioritizes flying zombies).
<color=black>•</color> Projectiles return 5 sun on hit and can be upgraded by passing through Infernal Esmagawoods for x4 Dano and the ability to return 25 sun each (with the increased sun value Odyssey Modifier, return 15 and 50 sun instead).<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Burger Blaster
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Plants often wonder about Burger Blaster's origins, Especially when they see him stacking other plants on him to enhance his power. In truth, he's just a byproduct of Dave's attempt to make a taco out of plants. "Actual product may vary. Additional fillings are self-provided."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Assemble the burger as instructed by the labels!

<color=blue>PvZ: Hybrid Edition Collab Plant</color>
<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat Vasebreaker - Chain Reaction</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×2/3s</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000> Tall plant. Fires random projectiles. Upgrades by using Cato, Melão-pulta, and Winter Melon to reach the highest level. Go to the next page for info on the upgrades.<color=black>

|</color> Cato Upgrade <color=black>|</color> Level: 0 → 1
<color=black>•</color> Resistência: 1000 → 2000
<color=black>•</color> Attack Interval: 3 → 2.5
<color=black>•</color> Num. of Shots: 2 → 4
<color=black>•</color> New Projectiles: Spike, Butter, Esmaga

<color=black>|</color> Melão-pulta Upgrade <color=black>|</color> Level: 1 → 2
<color=black>•</color> Resistência: 2000 → 3600
<color=black>•</color> Attack Dano: 36 → 40
<color=black>•</color> Num. of Shots: 4 → 6
<color=black>•</color> New Projectiles: Hot Melon, Melon

<color=black>|</color> Winter Melon Upgrade <color=black>|</color> Level: 2 → 3
<color=black>•</color> Resistência: 3600 → 4000
<color=black>•</color> Attack Interval: 2.5 → 2
<color=black>•</color> Num. of Shots: 6 → 8
<color=black>•</color> New Projectiles: Winter Melon, Snow Pea, Snow Spore, Doomspike<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Jicamagic
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I'm a grand magician to rival the great Imitater," proclaimed Jicamagic. However, only his good friend, Imitater, knows the truth: Jicamagic and Dr. Edgar used to study life sciences in the same class.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Catalyst for Titan fusions.

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat any Titan fusion level in Fusion Showcase</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>A fusion catalyst for Titan plants. Place it on the middle plant to start the fusion. Titan fusions are indicated with "∞".<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: Imitater
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I remember the Zombie Wars back in 76", says Imitater in a raspy, old-man's voice. "Back then, we didn't have all these fancy peashooters and Jalapeños. All we had was guts. Guts and a spoon."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Imitater can make copies of your plants!

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat Odyssey Gacha - Imitater</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Plant Imitater on a plant or fusion to receive a free seed packet of that plant.
<color=black>•</color> Cannot imitate pots, pads, Abóboras or drones. 
<color=black>•</color> Failure returns an Imitator seedpacket.</color>

plants.name: Neko Esmaga
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"The grace of a cat and the clumsiness of a Esmaga make a unique kind of beauty," Neko Esmagamurmurs."Once I master both, I'll stir things up on this lawn. She adjusts her hat and locks eyes on an unsuspecting zombie nearby."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Super Nyanko, Neko Esmaga!

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat Esmaga Showdown</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Drops itself if it doesn't hit anything. For each zombie crushed, a Esmaga seed packet is dropped, up to a maximum of 3. Crushing 3 or more zombies will drop an additional Spicy Esmaga seed packet. This does not trigger in water lanes.</color>

plants.name: Swordmaster Carambola</size>
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I have fought across 3,000 miles of battlefield, my blade halting millions in their tracks." The Swordmaster Carambola, a lover of fine drinks and poetry, takes great pride in his impeccable cosplaying skills. With a sly smile, he adds, "My sword never bleeds, for it is merely a decoration."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>A guest from afar, I think you will want to become friends.

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat The Gods 1</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>(200×5+36×20)/6s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack unleashes 5 swords that pierce infinitely, dealing 200 Dano each. Additionally, it inflicts 600 Dano to all zombies within the surrounding grid, repeating this 20 times.</color></size>

plants.name: Zombie Giftbox
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Introducing the Zombie Giftbox—the zombies' entry point into the world of finance. As a high-risk financial product, it comes equipped with a reminder: "Investing carries inherent risks; proceed with caution. Sponsored by Dr. Yan Wang." This vital information is cleverly tucked inside the box lid.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Earn 100 Sun, but spawns a Gold-box Zombie.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Grants 100 sun, but spawns a Golden Mystery-box Zombie. (Conehead/Buckethead Ducky Tube Zombie in water lanes)</color></size>

plants.name: Solar Giant-nut
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Twin Solar-nut asked me to do him a favor for 500 Sun, so I came. How difficult can it be? It can't be rushing into a pile of zombies... right...? It's not, right!?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Crushes zombies by rolling on them like a bowling ball.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>600/0.02s</color></size>
plants.cost: <size=36>Spawned when Twin Solar-nut is clicked when there's sufficient Sun.

plants.name: Cattail Girl
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Cats are usually afraid of water, but I'm a magical cat girl, so I'm not afraid," she said enthusiastically, and the other cats looked at her with admiration. Actually, she absolutely loves water, and she said this to make herself stand out.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The Cattail Girl will automatically attack all zombies that appear on the map. Prioritizes flying zombies.

<color=blue>P"Girls"vZ Collab Plant</color>
<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat Attack On Gargantuar!</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>40×2/1.5s</color></size>

plants.name: Barley
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Barley calls itself a generalist, but other plants think of it as just a bit player — "After all, other plants always do the work, don't they?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Barley regularly transforms into other plants.

<color=#4A2900>Unlock Conditions: Beat I, Zombie without clicking Start Fight</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Transforms into a random non-Odyssey fusion (or upgrade) plant every 36s. Transformation stops after further manual fusion.</color></size>

plants.name: Endoflame
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>It is said that small flowers like her would never dream of producing Sun — the Endoflame was originally going to apply for the position of Girassól, but she realized that her light would only shine when she is being destroyed. Everyone says that the flame at the top of her head is the brightest, but she knows that her fiery eyes of determination are the source of her strength.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Endoflame can absorb projectiles and produce Sun.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Absorbs at most 6 projectiles, each producing 25 Sun. Produces a Fertilizer upon death.</color></size>

plants.name: Giant-nut
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I am invincible on the battlefield, and my partners can't take their eyes off my majestic figure!" the Giant-nut boasted. "One year after getting kicked out of the Wall-nut Tumbler Club, I finally found a job that truly suits me."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Giant-nut rolls forward, knocking down all zombies in its path.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>600/0.02s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Rolls down the lane, killing all the zombies on its path.</color></size>

plants.name: Plant Giftbox
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>No one quite understands why the Plant Giftbox fights alongside the plants against the zombies. He doesn't look like a plant at all, yet he seems to know every plant's abilities inside and out. "Actually, I'm just a college student who loves video games," he admits with a grin. "The professor mentioned extra credit, so here I am."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The Plant Giftbox can be planted to produce random plants or fusions.

<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>When placed on soil or on a Nenúfar, produces a random plant. Placing it on top of an eligible plant can produce a random fusion.</color></size>

plants.name: Swordsage Carambola
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"The flowers in the hall intoxicate three thousand guests, and the sword frosts fourteen states." "I won't board the ship when the emperor calls me, and I say I am a fairy in wine." Swordsage Carambola likes to recite poems and practice his drunken sword skills when he is drunk. The plants marveled at his power to defeat the zombies, but he said that he was aiming his flying sword at the bright moon in the sky, but when he put the sword away, it would fall back to the earth. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Swordsage Carambola sweeps through enemies and summons ten giant swords descending from the sky.

<color=#3D1400>Usage conditions: Available only in Abyss Challenge, upgraded from Swordmaster Carambola after beating Level 10. You can only have 1 Swordsage Carambola on the lawn.</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>(1800×2+1800×10)/6s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>When attacking, deals 1800 Dano to zombies within a 3×3 area twice, then summons 10 giant swords that seek out enemies across the entire field, each dealing 1800 area Dano upon landing.</color>

plants.name: Empress-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Empress-shroom holds great affection for her zombie subordinates. "They contributed significantly to my rise as an Empress," she expressed. Unfortunately, these powerful zombies instill fear in other plants, something Empress-shroom is completely unaware of.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons zombies that will fight for you.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Hypnotizes biters up to 5 times.
<color=black>•</color> Every 36 seconds, randomly selects 1 of the following zombies to summon:
Football-nut Zombie | Enraged Cherryshooter Newspaper Zombie | Pea Commando Football | Bobsled Zomboni | Scholar Zombie | Zombarine.
<color=black>•</color> Instantly summons a zombie when an Enchantress-shroom dies within a 3×3 Alcance.
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Summon Interval → 10s | Enchantress-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
2. Can now summon corresponding Ultimate Zombies</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling Cherrybomber
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I'm not sure why the Gatling Pea has so many fans. My brother and I can fire four bullets too," Gatling Cherrybomber remarked enviously. However, the truth is that everyone appreciates Gatling Pea for his kindness and outstanding culinary talents.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gatling Cherrybomber is the strongest Dano-dealer on land.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>360×4/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Infernal Esmagawood Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Gatling Cherrybomber and Infernal Esmagawood to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color> Gatling Cherrybomber now fires equal amounts of projectiles across three lanes when attacking, with the upper and lower projectiles following sine and cosine trajectories. Infernal Esmagawood unleashes Jalapeño effect across the entire field if there’s no available space to spawn a Spicy Esmaga.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Plants' explosive cherries ×3 Dano
2. Attack Interval halved</color></size>

plants.name: Infernal Esmagawood
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Infernal Esmagawood has a high opinion of himself, but other plants regard him with disdain, particularly those in the pea family. "He's too picky! He possesses such strong power, yet it only benefits cherries," they say. This infuriates Infernal Esmagawood. "I'm just allergic to peas…"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spawns a Spicy Esmaga for every 20 projectiles that get converted after passing through.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Inherits Infernowood's traits, but does not burn zombies.
<color=black>•</color> Cherry bomb bullets that pass through it become bouncing spicy Esmagaes that explode after every bounce.
<color=black>•</color> For every 21 projectiles ignited, spawns a Spicy Esmaga in front.
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Gatling Cherrybomber Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Gatling Cherrybomber and Infernal Esmagawood to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color>Gatling Cherrybomber now fires equal amounts of projectiles across three lanes when attacking, with the upper and lower projectiles following sine and cosine trajectories. Infernal Esmagawood unleashes Jalapeño effect across the entire field if there’s no available space to spawn a Spicy Esmaga.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Projetiles required for Spicy Esmaga → 11; for Spicy Carambola → 26, 
2. When there's no space to produce a plant, directly ignite the lane instead</color></size>

plants.name: Cherrizilla
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Cherrizilla proudly says, "Many envy my dinosaur-like hairstyle." As a public figure, he's mindful of his image: "Spitting cherries and eating zombies is gross, but it's my duty."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherrizilla is the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=#4A2900><color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color></color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1000/1.75s</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Tall plant. Repels vehicles and takes at most 1/3 maximum Resistência per hit.
<color=black>•</color> Heals when hit by a explosive cherries (same effect as Cherry-nut). Excess HP drains at 800 per second, capped at 4× Resistência.
<color=black>•</color> Every 40s, can devour a non-miniboss zombie and restore HP to 4× Resistência and gain 1 Devour stack.
<color=black>•</color> Bites deal AoE Dano and bonus Dano equal to zombie's max HP×(3% + 0.2%× Devour stacks), healing for the same amount. After biting, spits out an explosive cherry.
<color=black>•</color> Invincibility: On taking lethal Dano, HP remains at 1 for 5s (once every 10s).</color>
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Obsidian Tall-nut Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color> When Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut are both present, Cherrizilla no longer has a maximum Resistência cap, and Obsidian Tall-Nut gains a 90% Dano reduction.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Heal amount ×3
2. Devour CD reduced to 15s</color></size>

plants.name: Doominator-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Would Death employ a fashionista? Doominator-shroom had no idea, but after noticing that he couldn't consistently frighten zombies, he turned to Hypno-shroom for some costume suggestions. Although people might not favor Death, how would they react if he wore sparkling ice wings?</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Doominator-shroom deals immense Dano, simultaneously hypnotizing and slowing down zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>100/0.5s</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 20 Cryo points.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Has a chance to turn zombies with Resistência < 40% into hypnotized Frost Tall-nut Sentinels.
<color=black>•</color> Creates an explosion in the grid where the hypnotized zombie is located, dealing 450 Dano.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Doominator-shroom attack speed ×3; Thornminator attack Dano ×3
2. Zombies take a 36% max HP Dano every time they become defrozen</color></size>

plants.name: Twin Solar-nut
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Twin Solar-nut, a photosynthesis master, revolutionized light energy-mass conversion, minimizing energy loss through recycling. He humbly credits the pioneers: "I'm just standing on the shoulders of giants."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Twin Solar-nut produces Sun every time it is injured.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Tapping on it:
- Spends 500 Sun.
- Restores his Resistência to full.
- Summons a Solar Giant-nut 1 tile ahead.
- Improves an existing Solar Giant-nut by enlarging its size and Dano (higher base Dano yields less bonus, down to 60%).
- After not tapping for 1s, the existing Solar Giant-nut will roll forward, crushing zombies. Dano per 0.02s is 600/1200/1644 for 1/2/3 taps respectively.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. The cost of manual taps is reduced to 200 Sun
2. Resistência reduced per hit → 10</color></size>

plants.name: Spikesidian
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After being baptized by fire and ice, Spikesidian became as hard as steel, but its temperament also became erratic. This change is likely due to the steel that condensed in its mouth, making it reluctant to speak.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spikesidian can deal immense Dano while also tanking multiple tires.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>360×2/1s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Possesses the characteristics of Spikerock. Recovers 500 Resistência every 15 seconds.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Dano ×5 | Obsidian Spike-nut Subspecies Unlocked
2. Gains a 95% Dano Reduction</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling Doom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Gatling Doom is dangerous and should not be approached. It is a forbidden force in the world." Despite the frightening tales circulating among the plants, Gatling Doom is not as it seems. In fact, it is one of the friendliest plants. However, the zombies turned to ashes would disagree.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Destruction incarnate. Fires rounds of destruction unlucky enough to face its wrath.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>360×4/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Fires a bullet of doom that deals 1800 Dano once every 4 round of bullets. Each bullet will splash Dano over a large area. Rests for 4.5s after the bullet of doom is shot.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. No more rest between every attack | Gatling Frenzy-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
2. Can now fire bullets of doom every round</color></size>

plants.name: Gatling Icicle-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The little puff-shrooms who once shouted, "We are going to join the army!" have matured into veterans with resolute eyes. Wherever and whenever, the Gatling Icicle-shroom Company is committed to ensuring that the mission is accomplished.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can be stacked three times to shoot 12 icicles at once!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×4×3/1.5s</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each hit adds 5 Cryo points. Icicles deal 4 times more Dano to frozen enemies. Each icicle can pierce 2 times.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Increased penetration to infinite times
2. Increased Dano to Frozen zombies by 10x | Gatling Sunburst-shroom Subspecies Unlocked</color></size>

plants.name: Magnetar
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>No one knows where Magnetar is from, but one thing's for sure: He was not responsible for the dinosaurs. Not at all!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Why the heck is there a meteor on my lawn!?

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>36×5/1.5s</color>
<color=#99582a>Lumos System: </color><color=#8B0000>+20 Dano per Lumos Level.</color>
<color=#666699>Sistema Magnético: </color><color=#8B0000>+5% Dano per Magnetic plant in the same system.
Both systems can increase the Dano of the stars by up to a max of 360.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Summons a meteor every 15s, dealing 1800 Dano upon impact. Splits into multiple stars that home in on zombies and deal 100 Dano each. Inherits aircraft-downing ability from Magnethorn.</color></color>
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Helios Cabbage Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Magnetar and Helios Cabbage to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color> When there are at least 10 Magnetars and 10 Helios Cabbages on the field, the Magnetar will summon the Helios Meteor instead, while Helios' summoned Mini Sun will not disappear and will also continue to summon ordinary Meteors.
<color=black>•</color> Helios Meteor: Deals Dano equal to (1800 + 1800 x Amount of Magnetars) x (1 + 0.2 x Amount of Helios Cabbages), and drops 1250 Sun.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Attack Interval → 0.5s
2. Lv1: Base Dano ×2 and Dano cap (360) increased to 3600; Lv2: Base Dano ×3, Dano cap removed</color></size>

plants.name: Oblivion-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Nuclear deterrence is beneficial. Someday, the zombies will stop their assaults out of fear of my formidable self-detonation," Oblivion-shroom asserted with confidence. Yet, it was evident that Oblivion-shroom failed to understand that zombies wouldn't initiate a Cold War just because they were hit with cold air.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Sprays deadly fumes all around, bringing ultimate destruction. Beware!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>(100+100×8)×4/1.9s</color>
<color=black>Dano Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>5×5</color>
<color=black>Detection Alcance: </color><color=#8B0000>5×3</color>
<color=#0077b6>Cryo System: </color><color=#8B0000>Each attack adds 5 Cryo points.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Sprays spores, which then explode (both deal penetrating Dano). An explosion occurs upon death, dealing 1800 Cremação Dano and freezing all zombies on the screen.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Oblivion-shroom Dano on death → 1M, Atomheart Planterna Lumos addition on death ×3
2. Now absorbs explosion Dano. When 10k Dano is absorbed, a Doom-gumelo explosion is released</color></size>

plants.name: Laser Abóbora
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Magneto-gumelo's power remains unmatched," said Laser Abóbora. "After all, composite armor, electromagnetic catapults, and plasma guns came nearly a century after aircraft carriers." Other plants envied Laser Abóbora's high-tech gear, but only Magneto-gumelo knew his power came from a Magnetar meteorite.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spawns laser drones that home in on enemies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=#666699>Sistema Magnético:</color> When part of a Sistema Magnético with a Mechanized Abóbora or any Metal-upgraded Abóbora, gains their Especial traits. Additionally, assimilates one Mechanized Abóbora in the same system into a Laser Abóbora every 36 seconds until there is only one Mechanized Abóbora.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Always has a Laser Drone wingman with him when he appears. Generates a Laser Drone on top of a tile around a 3×3 area regularly.
<color=black>•</color> Reflects 100 Dano back to zombies biting it.
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Wingmen Amount → 3
2. All drones Dano ×3</color></size>

plants.name: Laser Drone
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Thanks to Laser Abóbora, now we have an entire arsenal of hi-tech equipment! Take a look at these beauties: Composite alloy armor, electromagnetic rotor, and plasma railgun... Wait, NO!!! THAT WAS MY FAVORITE VASE!!!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Laser Drones shoot piercing lasers to attack.

<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>200/1.5 Seconds (Stationary)
200/1 Seconds (Wingman)</color></size>

plants.name: Obsidian Tall-nut
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Rather than seeking his best friend's protection, this plant prefers to protect him. With a hard, gem-like body and steadfast gaze, he's forged by the Obsidian Tall-nut's soul, enduring trials of ice and fire. Though his body may wear down one day, he's determined to keep other plants safe.</color></size></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>The Obsidian Tall-nut has four times the defense of a normal Tall-Nut.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>36000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Restores 1500 Resistência every 15 seconds.
<color=black>•</color> Tall plant. Resists being run over by a car, taking a maximum of 200 Dano each time.
<color=black>•</color> When one Obsidian Tall-nut receives Dano, it is shared and divided among all Obsidian Tall-nuts on the lawn.
<color=black>•</color> Recovers 10% lost HP when affected by Ice-shrooms or Jalapeños.
<color=black>•</color> Blocks Balloon Zombies from passing, forcing them into the ground.</color>
<color=black>Related Odyssey Modifier: Cherrizilla Synergy</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> You need to have unlocked all the Odyssey Modifiers of Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut to obtain this synergy.
<color=black>•</color> When Cherrizilla and Obsidian Tall-nut are both present, Cherrizilla no longer has a maximum Resistência cap, and Obsidian Tall-Nut gains a 90% Dano reduction.</color>

<color=black>Main Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#8B0000>1. Max HP Cap ×3
2. Redirects Dano dealt to adjacent plants in the same lane to itself</color></size>

plants.name: Wither-pult
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After overcoming past struggles, Wither-pult now aims for a calm life. "All I want now is to watch classic movies and live in peace."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Capable of rapid, spread-fire volleys of projectiles.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>120/2s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>42% chance of rapid-firing. Has an equal chance to spread-fire in a number equal to the number of zombies in its lane. Projectiles split into Alho cabbage, Alho kernel (25% Alho butter), and Alho melon upon impact.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Spread-fire is now guaranteed
2. Lv1: Stacking Poison points will immediately poison the zombie and Poison Value Cap → 120; Lv2: Poison Value Cap removed</color>

plants.name: Cob-livion Cannon
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Clad in icy armor and dark as a warning, each shot from Cob-livion Cannon brings destruction. Zombies hit by it need not prepare—nothing will remain after the flash.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Possesses earth-shattering power.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Main Blast - 1800 in a 3×3 area. 
<color=black>•</color> Additional 1800 + 36% of Zombies' maximum Resistência across the entire screen.
<color=black>•</color> Side Gun: 360×2/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Arming Time: </color><color=#8B0000>36s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Infuses all plants within the main blast area with Ice-shroom (prioritized)/Doom-gumelo. 
<color=black>•</color> Side cannon inflicts Frio and adds 10 Cryo points.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Main Blast Dano ×4
2. Reload Time → 12s</color>

plants.name: Midas Umbrella
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>From its appearance, you can tell that Midas Umbrella has a knack for business. "That's right, my hat of emerald was a trade item I exchanged with someone from a place full of blocks..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A combination of Alchemist Umbrella and Umbrella Kale.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Has the traits of both its ingredients.
<color=black>•</color> Bouncing projectiles now increases their Dano by 100%.
<color=black>•</color> Also allows projectiles to hit zombies in the two rows below.
<color=black>•</color> Its Coffee Bean ultimate can instantly kill zombies below 50% Resistência.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:<color=#8B0000>
1. Bounced projectiles additional Dano 100% → 360%
2. Activates ultimate automatically free of charge if zombies are near, 7.5s cooldown | Aegis Umbrella Subspecies Unlocked</color>

plants.name: Enchantress-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The subjects of the Empress-shroom are captivated by the Enchantress-shroom's mysterious power. "She's not just my advisor; she's the force that keeps our kingdom thriving. Her magic isn't just powerful—it's explosive", the Empress-shroom declared. In truth, the Enchantress-shroom simply delights in blowing up any unruly dissenters who dare resist her charm.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons exclusively explosive zombies to fight for you!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Empress-shroom's Modifier</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> The same as Empress-shroom, but only summons Cherryshooter Newspaper Zombie/Zombarine/Gatling Cherry Newspaper/Gatling Explod-o-rider zombies.
<color=black>•</color> Benefits from Empress-shroom modifiers.
<color=black>•</color> Immediately summons when an Empress-shroom dies in a 3×3 Alcance, Empress-shroom too when a nearby Enchantress-shroom dies.</color>

plants.name: Ashen Trêsvilha
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The flames consume his broken body, each breath a torment, yet the Ashen Trêsvilha stands tall. He believes the fire within will achieve eternal glory in one final, grand explosion.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ashen Trêsvilha awaits his rebirth.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Loses attack capabilities after being thoroughly burnt.</color>

plants.name: Phoenix Trêsvilha
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>No one knows if fire truly brings rebirth to plants—it's just a legend. Those who chased it turned to ash, until he became the new legend. "I don't know how many times I must endure the flames to succeed, but for them, I have to."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>From fire reborn!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>160×3/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Ignites the whole lawn upon entry.
<color=black>•</color> Its bullets inflict the Enflamed debuff and pierce 2 times.
<color=black>•</color> Its Dano is doubled after passing through a Infernal Esmagawood.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Enflamed Dano multiplier → 150%, and regular ignited peas can now inflict the debuff
2. Bullets can now pierce infinitely and cause Enflamed explosions</color>

plants.name: Gravitron
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Gravitron has mastered electromagnetism with Magnetar. "It's not rocket science—left-hand force, right-hand electricity", it boasted. "And don't forget the moving magnet—trust the smartest plant around!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Gravitron pulls stars, accelerates them and launches at zombies at maximum force.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Magnetar</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Magnetar.
<color=black>•</color> Storage Limit - 60 | Acceleration Time - 1.5s | Dano ×3 | Projectile Speed ×2</color>

plants.name: Garlizilla
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Dressed in plain clothes with a gaudy gold tooth, one word from him sends others fleeing. "Alhok me, I've had enough of the spotlight. Standing out doesn't suit me anymore—I just want a quiet, simple life."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cousin to the ultimate defensive plant on land.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Cherrizilla</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>1000/1.75s</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=#5E1675>Poison System: </color><color=#8B0000>inherits Alho properties, and shoots projectiles that poison zombies.</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Cherrizilla.
<color=black>•</color> No longer heals from cherry explosions.</color>

plants.name: Blast Abóbora
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Cherry? Abóbora? Or a hybrid born of fusion? The Blast Abóbora doesn't bother with such details. For him, Halloween is all about handing out juicy cherries to the good kids and cherry bombs to the naughty ones—nothing else matters. </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blast-proof Abóbora.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Laser Abóbora</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Laser Abóbora. No longer spawns Laser Drones or assimilates Mechanized Abóboras, instead spawns self-destructing drones every 36 seconds that seek out zombies and explode like a Cherry Bomb.
<color=black>•</color> Absorbs the Dano from cherry explosions to heal from them.</color>

plants.name: Aegis Umbrella
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Many question the relationship between Midas Umbrella and Aegis Umbrella. "We're brothers!" Aegis confidently declares, thumping its canopy. "My dear elder brother is just going through a rough patch emotionally."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Reflects projectiles from zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Midas Umbrella's Modifier</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Midas Umbrella.
<color=black>•</color> Loses the ability to buff lobbed projectiles and attract tridents. Instead, gain 90% Dano Reduction and the ability to reflect bullets from zombies.</color></color>

plants.name: Charmatron-shroom
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>With the power of love and friendship, even a rotting zombie with an unbeating heart would become our best friend and greatest ally! Well, that and a copious amount of suspicious mind-altering spores powered by magnets of all things that are <b>DEFINITELY<b> safe for human contact. Well, for now at least...
- TetsuDaPlanta (@tetsuchris)</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Charisma maxima.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>80/2s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Projectiles have a 1-tile splash radius with no falloff.
<color=black>•</color> Zombies cannot consume it and are hypnotized instead.
<color=black>•</color> Feeding it metal objects grants 1 charge level for 36 seconds, up to 2 charges.
<color=black>•</color> At charge level 1, it fires 2 shots per attack. At charge Level 2, 4 shots.
<color=#666699>Sistema Magnético:</color> Each plant in the same Sistema Magnético provides a 5% Dano boost to its shots.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Hypnotization Resistência threshold increased from 50% to 100%
2. Charge does not drop below 2, max charge increased to 3 | Attack Interval → 1 Second</color>

plants.name: Obsidian-mine
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Obsidian-mine possesses immense power despite its size. He fears no zombies. However, it has its troubles, as block people with diamond pickaxes often come to knock on its head.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Has extremely high Resistência and can block Diggers.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Obsidian Tall-nut</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>36000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Obsidian Tall-nut.
<color=black>•</color> Planta baixa (evade projéteis diretos).
<color=black>•</color> Blocks Digger Zombies.
<color=black>•</color> Releases a small potato explosion for every 1000 Dano received (before Dano reduction), dealing 500 Dano to zombies in a small area.<size=36>

plants.name: Magicat Nettle
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I think it's better to use animal hair to keep myself above water than relying on, for example, a swim ring!" Magicat Nettle stands by her belief. Hmm... If you think this is due to her poor academic skills and inability to stay afloat on the river, you're right. How could a cat possibly swim! Though she refuses to be categorized randomly.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Summons drones to attack every time she defeats a zombie.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>160×2/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Summons a drone every time a zombie killed. The drone fires 36 nettle spikes that deal 100 Dano each.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Basic Attack Dano ×5.
2. Drone Attack Dano ×3.</color><size=36>

plants.name: Titan Apeacalypse Minigun
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Titan Apeacalypse Minigun rarely interacts with people. It's not due to arrogance, but because people keep asking whether the fire on his body is hot or cold, and whether he can create hot ice or cold fire. These questions bore him.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Becomes stronger the more Resistência it loses.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>120×3/0.5s</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Each shot fired inflict 50 self-Dano until Resistência is reduced to 1500. 
<color=black>•</color> Shots knockback zombies and pierce twice, with power halved per pierce. 
<color=black>•</color> Fires faster as Resistência decreases and reaches maximum speed of 0.25 seconds at 1/3 Resistência. If Resistência is further reduced, attack Dano increases. Dano is capped at 480 at 0 Resistência.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Lv1: Defense increases as Resistência decreases. Below 500 HP, it becomes immune to Dano under 1k; Lv2: Below 500 HP, base Dano ×2
2. Increases projectile Dano and knockback ×3</color><size=36>

plants.name: Calamity-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Everyone wonders how Calamity-shroom subdues massive creatures to serve her. Endless destruction should bring silence... When questioned, she sits alone atop a tower, sipping her dreamy brew: "Oblivion? No, I simply grant them rebirth within illusions."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turn the tide of battle!

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Initial Selection</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>Hypnotizes zombies in Alcance (same as Doom-gumelo) and makes them explode upon death, dealing Dano like Doom-gumelo.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
<color=#8B0000>1. Doom-gumelo explosions now leave no craters | Avarice-shroom Subspecies Unlocked
2. Summons 3 hypnotized Armored Gargantuars upon explosion. Each hypnotized zombie summons a Zomboni too</color><size=36>

plants.name: Gatling Sunburst-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Production is also part of the fight!" said Gatling Sunburst-shroom, wiping its sweat. Its platoon has been reorganized into the 'Sunshine Bay Construction Corps,' but their fighting spirit remains undiminished.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates a large amount of sun for you.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Gatling Icicle-shroom's Modifier</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>20×4×3/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Gatling Icicle-shroom.
<color=black>•</color> Shots no longer slow but instead drop 5 sun on hitting the 1st and 2nd zombies.
<color=black>•</color> Each subsequent pierce deals 20 more Dano but requires 5 sun per hit (does not consume Sun if the total amount of Sun is below 15k).
<color=black>•</color> Synergizes with the sun value doubling Odyssey Modifier and dropped suns are worth 15 each when the modifier is active.</color><size=36>

plants.name: Gatling Frenzy-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Compared to the composed demeanor of Gatling Doom, Gatling Frenzy-shroom has a much shorter temper, Especially when someone calls her a "Gray Egg". She often yells "Quietus!" and charges into the fray.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Continuously fires Doom-gumelo attacks at zombies.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Gatling Doom's Modifier.</color>
<color=black>Dano: </color><color=#8B0000>360/1.5 Seconds (0.25 Minimum)</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Gatling Doom.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack will shorten the attack interval by 0.1 seconds, to a minimum of 0.25 seconds. Explodes when zombies get near.
<color=black>•</color> Fires a bullet of doom every 16 attacks, dealing 1800 Dano. When the "fires bullets of doom every round" Odyssey Modifier is active, fires a bullet of doom every 4 attacks.</color><size=36>

plants.name: Obsidian Spike-nut
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Obsidian Spike-nut loves hugs. "A warm embrace can soothe even the rowdiest of zombies," he says. And sure enough, every zombie he's hugged is now lying peacefully on the lawn... completely still.
plants.info:
<size=36>Defends against zombies and vehicles with its spikes.

<color=#4A2900>Usage Condition: Odyssey Mode | Unlockable With Spikesidian's Modifier.</color>
<color=black>Resistência: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Especial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspecies of Spikesidian.
<color=black>•</color> Reflects 500 Dano back to zombies biting it (after Modifier).
<color=black>•</color> Received Dano is capped at 1000.
<color=black>•</color> Recovers 1500 Resistência per 15 Seconds.
